## FirebaseAccessToken interface

Type representing a Firebase OAuth access token (derived from a Google OAuth2 access token) which can be used to authenticate to Firebase services such as the Realtime Database and Auth.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FirebaseAccessToken 
```
